price: 58. Allah, Lui, est le Dispensateur de subsistance, le Très Fort, l’Inébranlable.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
